entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
